Package org.jtool.cfg

Class CallGraph

java.lang.Object
org.jtool.graph.Graph<CFGNode,​ControlFlow>
org.jtool.cfg.CallGraph
public class CallGraph
extends Graph<CFGNode,​ControlFlow>
An object storing information about a call graph.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.lang.String name
    The name of this call graph.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    CallGraph​(java.lang.String name)
    Creates a call graph having a given name.
